title: 两个数组的交集 II (Intersection of Two Arrays II)
content: 思路: // @Title: 两个数组的交集 II (Intersection of Two Arrays II) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2021-08-16 16:26:00 // @Runtime: 2 ms // @Memory: 38.8 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int[] intersect(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) { ArrayList<Integer> result=new ArrayList<Integer>(); HashMap<Integer,Integer> nums1Map=new HashMap<>(); for (int i : nums1) { Integer num=nums1Map.get(i); if (num==null){ nums1Map.put(i,1); }else { nums1Map.put(i,num+1); } } for (int i : nums2) { Integer count=nums1Map.get(i); if (count!=null&&count>0){ result.add(i); nums1Map.put(i,count-1); } } int[] r=new int[result.size()]; int count=0; for (Integer i : result) { r[count++]=i.intValue(); } return r; } }
